meanings.sent1: The brightening of the stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the brightening of the colors after cleaning the stained glass window.
meanings.sent3: The brightening of the mood in the room was thanks to the clown's antics.
meanings.sent4: The brightening of the city skyline at dusk was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The gradual brightening of the room as the sun rose was a peaceful awakening.
